full_summary:
**Multiple Victoria Class Spares: Filter Element, Fluid Procurement**

**Tender Information**

* Reference Number: CB-466-40178475 (CB-02-362)
* Solicitation Number: W8482-242103/A
* Publication Date: May 10, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: July 5, 2024 2:00 PM (Eastern Time)
* Expected Contract Start Date: August 30, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2025

**Contract Information**

* Contracting Entity: National Defence Canada
* Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2
* Contact Information: Cassandra Leach, (999) 999-9999, Cassandra.Leach@forces.gc.ca

**Product Overview**

The Department of National Defence is soliciting bids for the procurement of multiple Victoria Class Spares: Filter Element, Fluid. The items are required for the following locations:

* CFB Esquimalt: 44 x Filter Element, Fluid (Part No. HC9021FHP8Z, NCAGE: 17238)
* CFB Halifax: 15 x Filter Element, Fluid (Part No. HC9021FHP8Z, NCAGE: 17238)
* CFB Esquimalt: 19 x Filter Element, Fluid (Part No. HC9600FRN8Z, NCAGE: 17238)
* CFB Halifax: 15 x Filter Element, Fluid (Part No. HC9600FRN8Z, NCAGE: 17238)

**Procurement Details**

* Procurement Method: Competitive - Traditional
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Document Submission**

Please submit all documents in either English or French to:

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32699/w8482-242103a_rfp_amd001_1.pdf
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32699/w8482-242103-a---amd001---annex-a.xls
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32699/w8482-242103a_rfp.pdf

**Note**
